page.title: 05SARAH MONK'S SUNDAY
page.content: I am Sarah Monk. I am 11 years old and I live in Hadfield. On Sunday I get up at about 10 am and have a big breakfast. At 11 am my Mum and I go to my Gran's at Denton about 5 miles away. We don't get back till 3 pm. While we are at Gran's Dad plays golf. Dad doesn't get home until 5 pm. Then we have tea which is Sunday dinner. All we do then is watch T.V. I clean out the rabbits then have a nice hot bath to get all the rabbit mess off me. I get out of the bath and put my dressing gown on. I go downstairs and play Blackjack with my Mum until I go to bed at 9.30 pm. I then read for about ten minutes before going to sleep.
